name: SERVICIOS AEREOS COSTA CALIDA, S.L.
about: Servicios Aéreos Costa Cálida, S.L. is a renowned flight training school located in the Region of Murcia, Spain. As the only Approved Training Organisation (ATO) licensed by the Spanish Aviation Safety and Security Agency (AESA) in the region, we boast over 15 years of experience in aeronautical training. Our team is composed entirely of professionals from the aviation sector, ensuring high standards of quality and safety. We offer flexible training programs tailored to individual needs, with a strong focus on both theoretical and practical education. Our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction has earned us the trust of numerous students and clients. With a proven track record and a dedicated team, we are your reliable choice for comprehensive flight training.
